attributes.action: address marriage and childbirth factors in education policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The birth of a baby is a miracle, all over the world. But being a mum shouldn't deter the young from pursuing their career and education. In fact, if young people have cash coming in, then their burden is more likely to be eased. Please facilitate moves against discrimination against pregnant working women - which IS still occuring (believe it or not !) as part of your family - friendly manifesto. Why cannot I not put A4E/ Royal College of midwives booklets on maternity rights in a UK job centre for mums ? Reproductive health rights include adolescents and working mums - shall the Blair babes burn a few bars (oops I mean bras) ? The petitioner is calling on the PM to endorse Mums plus one and go over backwards public managers' heads for first time mums who don't know their rights.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
